TopicTitle: My Plan for my Ultimate Pokemon Team

Articles.Content:
What I want to do eventually, is bring my strongest Pokemon together into one team. Currently, my two best Pokemon (as of now) are:

  • Typhlosion (Pokemon HeartGold)

  • Sammurott (Pokemon White)

I might also bring in some of my legendary Pokemon. Once Pokemon Y/X comes out, I will choose my starter to be Chespin, and make him into one of my strongest Pokemon. Victini may be in the team, but Cobalion (from Pokemon White) is definitely going in the team. He is very awesome. So, yah. Might also try to get a Deoxys as my Ultimate Pokemon Team psychic Pokemon.
